# Blogger

A blogging website where you can share your thoughts with the world. Share your knowledge with others.

## Features

1. Login and Register
2. Profile
3. Create blog
4. Update the blog
5. Delete the blog
6. Like and comment on a blog
7. JWT authentication with refresh token
8. Real time comments with socket io
9. Skeleton loading

## Tech Stack

1. Javascript
2. Node JS
3. React JS
4. Mongodb
5. Axios
6. Styled Components
